commit.message:
c-cppbuiltin.c (c_cpp_builtins): Remove definition of __STDC_WANT_DEC_FP__.

	* c-cppbuiltin.c (c_cpp_builtins): Remove definition of
	__STDC_WANT_DEC_FP__.

From-SVN: r123973

files.patch:

+	__STDC_WANT_DEC_FP__.

 	* configure.ac: Allow both powerpc*-*-linux* and powerpc*-*-gnu*
